segments.text: Good morning , Miss Wang . How beautiful you look today !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who taught you to put on make-up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's me . I have studied make-up at a beauty shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you teach me how to do make-up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . First , use eye shadow to heighten your eyes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What eye shadow do you think is the most fit for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think pink eye shadow is popular among Chinese girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you protect yourself from chapped lips ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest you use lipstick , which also accentuates your lips .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How did you grow such long nails ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to pay attention to trimming them from time to time .
segments.speaker: S2
